title: patient_by_age_range
description: SELECT * FROM ods.tbl_patient WHERE age BETWEEN :minAge AND :maxAge ORDER BY age

title: chart_by_patient
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.patient_id = p.id WHERE c.patient_id = :patientId ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_date_range
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.patient_id = p.id WHERE c.chart_date BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: chart_by_doctor
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.patient_id = p.id WHERE c.doctor_name = :doctorName ORDER BY c.chart_date DESC

title: record_by_patient
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_record r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.patient_id = p.id WHERE r.patient_id = :patientId ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: record_by_chart
description: SELECT r.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_record r JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON r.patient_id = p.id WHERE r.chart_id = :chartId ORDER BY r.created_at DESC

title: patient_stats_by_gender
description: SELECT gender, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(age) as avg_age FROM ods.tbl_patient GROUP BY gender

title: recent_charts
description: SELECT c.*, p.patient_name FROM ods.tbl_chart c JOIN ods.tbl_patient p ON c.patient_id = p.id ORDER BY c.created_at DESC LIMIT :limit
